name: Hellescaper (G0rgen)
description:
Lore:

When people die, they go to hell or heaven. The very good ones go to Heaven. Everyone else goes to hell. In hell everyone has the courage to collect heavenly coins and escape to heaven. Anita is one of those less polite, help her escape to heaven.

Gameplay:

  • Secret rooms
  • 3 LvL
  • Hell

Credits:

  • Made with Unity
  • Drawings  Aseprite
  • Special Thenks: Marvin,Kamil,MuratThorben,Toasted-gears,Zoe
